org.jvoicexml.implementation
Interface UserInputListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
JVoiceXmlImplementationPlatform
public interface UserInputListener

Listener for events from the UserInput implementation.

Method Summary
 void resultAccepted(RecognitionResult result)
          The user made an utterance, that matched an active grammar.
 void resultRejected(RecognitionResult result)
          The user made an utterance, that did not match an active grammar.
 void speechStarted(BargeInType type)
          Notification that the user started to speak.
 

Method Detail

speechStarted

void speechStarted(BargeInType type)
Notification that the user started to speak.

This method is called whenever the recognizer arrives at a supported barge-in type.

Parameters:
type - Type of the notificatation.

resultAccepted

void resultAccepted(RecognitionResult result)
The user made an utterance, that matched an active grammar.

Parameters:
result - The recognition result.

resultRejected

void resultRejected(RecognitionResult result)
The user made an utterance, that did not match an active grammar.

Parameters:
result - The recognition result.
